inputs.description: Set first stimulus time to 'ff' seconds. [Default=0]
inputs.name: FIRST

inputs.description: Each stimulus has only 1 phase.  'gg' is the file specifying the allowable gaps between stimuli, which will be chosen randomly without replacement.  This gap file should have 1 row.
inputs.name: 1PHASE

inputs.description: Each stimulus has 2 phases.  'gg' is the gap file.  The first row is the gap between phase #1 and phase #2.  The second row is the gap between phase #2 and the next phase #1.   ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: 2PHASE
